text.div:
Observations affecting Medical Eligibility values

Codes representing possible values for the Observations affecting Medical Eligibility element

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10
    CodeDisplay
    Z72.0Smoker
    N93.9Vaginal bleeding pattern Irregular
    N92.6Vaginal bleeding pattern Irregular
    z72.51High risk of HIV
  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    110483000Smoker
    724460004Bleeding or blood clots after the procedure
    80182007Vaginal bleeding pattern Irregular
    351814001Heavy or prolonged vaginal bleeding - regular and irregular
    723509005High risk of HIV
    58126003Infection at the puncture or incision site
    38082009Blood haemoglobin test
  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    718-7Blood haemoglobin test

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

name: medicaleligibilityobservations-values
title: Observations affecting Medical Eligibility values
description: Codes representing possible values for the Observations affecting Medical Eligibility element

concept.display: Bleeding or blood clots after the procedure
Heavy or prolonged vaginal bleeding - regular and irregular
